title: changing the username
body: hey, I met a serious problem, I login onto my account  today, but it shows I have to change my username, How can I change my username, I have no idea about that.{{summoner:3}}

replies.body:
Your Username is what you use to login to the game with. As League of Legends accounts make the transition to Riot accounts, these become global rather than regional, and so an update is required.

If your UN doesn't exist anywhere else, then it will automatically update your RIot account username (which you will still use to login to League) to the same as what you had.

 If your UN *does* exist elsewhere, like a PBE or other region account, then you will have to choose a new UN (or update those other region accounts first) to confirm the creation of the RIot account.

Well at least now I know why I can't my original one again, thanks for the info.

Now to track all the accounts I made before oce was a thing....sigh.
